insert into save_path (no, sub_problem_no, save_no, package_path) values
((select sp.no from save_path sp where sp.sub_problem_no = ${item.subProblemNo } and sp.save_no = ${item.saveNo }), ${item.subProblemNo }, ${item.saveNo }, '${item.packagePath }')
on duplicate key update sub_problem_no = values(sub_problem_no), save_no = values(save_no), package_path= values(package_path)

insert into code (no, save_path_no, language, code, file_name) values
((select c.no from code c where c.save_path_no = ${savePathNo } and c.language = '${language }' and c.code = '${code }' and c.file_name = '${fileName}') , ${item.savePathNo }, '${item.language }', '${item.code }', '${item.fileName}')
on duplicate key update save_path_no = values(save_path_no), language = values(language), code = values(code), file_name = values(file_name)
